heading.title: !In Vino Veritas!
heading.subtitle: Satisfy your senses with the best quality food and drink in town.
heading.content: After a long walk, hard work, a tiring day, you deserve a break, and is there any better way to reward yourself than by enjoying the best bites and sips, so indulge in hedonism and don't regret it. Little things in everyday life can make you happy . Novi Sad offers you everything you are missing!

heading.title: RESTAURANTS
heading.content: Whether you like eating at an upscale restaurant or a casual bar, it is good to know where you can grab a delicious meal. Whether it's a business lunch, a romantic dinner, or just a hearty appetizer with your favorite drink, you'll always find a suitable place for it in Novi Sad.

eatDrinkCard.title: National
eatDrinkCard.content: What is tastier than homemade food? Enjoy sarma, karađorđeva steak, pihtije, čvarci, etc

eatDrinkCard.title: Express
eatDrinkCard.content: Hungry and in a hurry? The best option for you are express restaurants that offer cooked meals of the highest quality.

eatDrinkCard.title: International
eatDrinkCard.content: If you like new tastes and experimenting with food, visit one of the best international restaurants.

eatDrinkCard.title: Vegan
eatDrinkCard.content: Not a fan of meat and other animal products? Vegan restaurants are the right choice for you.

heading.title: PIZZERIAS / BAKERIES / PANCAKE SHOPS / STREET FOOD
heading.content: Don't have enough time for restaurants? No problem, there are bakeries, street food, pancake shops, pizzerias, etc. You won't be hungry.

eatDrinkCard.title: Pizzerias
eatDrinkCard.content: What's the first thing that comes to your mind when you're hungry? Pizza maybe? Try our specialties, you won't regret.

eatDrinkCard.title: Bakeries
eatDrinkCard.content: Is there a better smell than freshly baked bread? Come and try various types of pastries, sweet products, burek, sandwiches.

eatDrinkCard.title: Pancake shops
eatDrinkCard.content: Soft, melting, satin-soft, filled as desired, I became a symbol of many childhoods. The accessories kept changing, but I stayed the same. Salty or sweet? Everything to your taste!

eatDrinkCard.title: Street food
eatDrinkCard.content: The global popularity trend of the so-called street food is becoming ever more expressed in Novi Sad. The offer itself is the most diverse possible: from burgers, salads, pancakes, gyros, pies, grill…

heading.title: PASTRY SHOPS /  CAFETERIAS
heading.content: If you want that taste of cakes and cookies with coffee, which reminds you of some more beautiful and cheerful, carefree times, come and visit us. We are waiting for you!

eatDrinkCard.title: Sweet to make everything go smoothly
eatDrinkCard.content: For those who cannot imagine a meal without dessert, there are patisseries that offer homemade strudels, dumplings, vanilla crannies, dumplings, cakes, donuts, anything you want. Visit us and enjoy sweet snacks.

eatDrinkCard.title: Coffee for balance
eatDrinkCard.content: We start our day with coffee, so take a break, relax and enjoy the smell and taste of the powerful drink. There are more and more places with an excellent selection of coffee in our city, so don't wait and try different types of coffee.

heading.title: BEERHOUSES  / PUBS
heading.subtitle: What? No beer?!
heading.content: You can visit some beerhouses and pubs in Novi Sad. “Brauhaus” is a popular microbrewery that serves its craft beers. You can get an unusual service in PUBeraj, a pub that is also a barbershop, so you can wait your turn for a haircut.

eatDrinkCard.title: NOVI SAD BEER FESTIVAL
eatDrinkCard.content: 4. i 5. novembar

eatDrinkCard.title: Live music
eatDrinkCard.content: This Friday, we have singled out for you the most interesting nightlife options in Novi Sad. Since a special spectacle awaits you on Saturday, the offer of other bars in Novi Sad for that day is not as varied as for Friday.

eatDrinkCard.title: Techno and beer
eatDrinkCard.content: The weather forecast predicts rain, but this does not affect the parties that are announced. Read what awaits you this coming weekend in Novi Sad, with a special surprise for all lovers of techno sound.

heading.title: OTHER...
heading.content: Novi Sad is the place where food is always delicious and meals could be eaten at a slow pace. If you wish to enjoy in autochthonous dishes, excellent wines, fruit “rakijas”, and music of “tamburitza” players we recommend you to go to one of the “čardas” along the Danube or “salaš” restaurants in the nearby settlements. The wines from Fruška Gora: Riesling, Neoplanta, Semillon, Sirmium, Slankamenka, or Bermet are served traditionally with local dishes.

eatDrinkCard.title: Carde
eatDrinkCard.content: If you want to escape from the noise and bustle of the city this weekend, to spend the day in the fresh air by the river bank, and to eat well at the same time, the right place for you is “carda”. There are some good fish restaurants around 5km far from the center of Novi Sad.

eatDrinkCard.title: Wineries
eatDrinkCard.content: “In vino veritas!” The modern assortment for the production of Fruška Gora's red wines consists of: Merlot, Probus, Frankovka, Portugizer, Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, Pinot Red, and for white wines: Italian Riesling, Chardonnay, Župljanka, Sauvignon, Traminac, then Neoplanta, Sila, Rhine Riesling...

eatDrinkCard.title: Farmsteads
eatDrinkCard.content: If you want silence and rest, farmsteads are the choice for you. You will be able to recharge your batteries and enjoy the relaxed atmosphere and rich offer of various Vojvodina specialties.

heading.title: Feel the spirit of the Winter Fantasy in Novi Sad!
heading.subtitle: “Ice Forest” and the Danube Park fairy-tale ice rink
heading.content: The sixth “Ice Forest” event will take place from December 17, 2022 to January 16, 2023 and will offer a variety of cultural events, educational gatherings, exhibitions, and humanitarian meetings in the spirit of holiday tradition and fun. The diverse program and unique setting of the Danube Park will be complemented by holiday decorations and the Snow City - winter bazaar, which is aimed at showcasing local crafts and artists as well as promoting Vojvodinian culinary specialties and winter delicacies

heading.title: New Year's Eve in the Suburbium of the Petrovaradin Fortress
heading.content: Novi Sad, as the European Capital of Culture, will close the year 2022 with New Year's Eve, an extraordinary artistic and production program that will highlight the baroque ambiance of the Petrovaradin Fortress Suburb. On December 31st, the audience will enjoy a musical program on several stages: Perpetuum Jazzile will open the main stage in front of the Belgrade Gate at 9 pm, followed by Kosheen at 11 pm, and DJ Biesmans who will perform half an hour after midnight

eventCard.title: Perpetuum Jazzile
eventCard.content: “When voice becomes an instrument… and an instrument becomes the voice, one can hear the pulse of rhythmic freshness and harmonic fusion of Perpetuum Jazzile.”

eventCard.title: Repetitor
eventCard.content: One of the most exciting concert attractions of European alternative rock, a favorite name at many festivals - Repetitor is coming to the Suburb! With their creative skills since their first album, they have received high ratings from critics, and their live performances bring a unique energy, which we will not miss on December 31st. See you at New Year's Eve on Štrosmajerova street, on the small stage at 11 pm.

heading.title: Christmas-New Year's Eve concerts
heading.content: Celebrate the holidays with an unforgettable series of Christmas and New Year's concerts, featuring some of the most talented artists in the region

heading.title: Museums and exhibitions
heading.content: Explore the world of art and culture with a visit to our museums and exhibitions, featuring the latest and greatest in the world of creativity.

eventCard.title: Zimzarije in Museum of Vojvodina
eventCard.content: A winter children's art workshop is being held, providing an opportunity for kids to express their creativity and imagination through hands-on activities and projects.

eventCard.title: Uroš Predić: A Life Dedicated to Beauty and Art
eventCard.content: In the year of marking a significant jubilee - 175 years since the foundation of the Gallery of Matica Srpska, we are realizing a large monographic exhibition dedicated to the work of one of the most outstanding national painters, Uroš Predić. Exhibition Uroš Predić. A Life Dedicated to Beauty and Art, through the story of the life and work of this great personality of Serbian culture and art, simultaneously points to the fundamental values of the Gallery of Matica Srpska: endowment, dedication to the common good and national values, as well as the importance of this painter for the history of Serbian art.

eventCard.title: Sava Šumanović and Realisms in Europe Between the Two World Wars
eventCard.content: Almost the entire painting of Sava Šumanović (1896-1942) belongs to the period between the two world wars. Building a more comprehensive picture of Šumanović's realisms and their relations with international art tendencies was the starting point in the approach to this exhibition held in The Pavle Beljanski Memorial Collection, The Gallery of Matica Srpska and the Art Gallery “Sava Šumanović” in Šid.

heading.title: The last race of the year
heading.content: Get ready for the final race of the year! The Winter Trail Race is coming to the slopes of Fruška Gora, offering a challenging and exhilarating experience for all participants. Don't miss out on this opportunity to push your limits and end the year on a high note.

heading.title: Sport and recreation
heading.content: Enjoy various recreational and sporting activities in the city! From cycling, swimming, yoga, to various team sports, there are many options for those who want to have fun and stay fit. Join the fun and challenge yourself with one of these activities!

eventCard.title: Ice Hall Spens
eventCard.content: The ice skating season in Novi Sad has already begun. Spens Ice Rink will be a place for good fun and entertainment again this winter, for the youngest, the loved ones, friends, as well as for moms and dads and those a bit older.

eventCard.title: Running and recreation
eventCard.content: The walking path located on the Belgrade quay, was created after the complete reconstruction of the quay and is considered a path that is arranged according to the most modern standards. The length of the walking path is along the entire length of the Belgrade quay....

eventCard.title: Cycling
eventCard.content: Get ready to hit the streets on two wheels! A city cycling race is taking place, offering a fun and thrilling experience for all levels of riders. Join in and test your skills as you pedal through the heart of the city.

eventCard.title: Pool SPC Slana Bara
eventCard.content: Get ready to dive in! The indoor pool season is starting, offering a perfect place to swim, exercise, and have fun regardless of the weather.

heading.title: Entertainment
heading.content: Get ready for a weekend of fun, food, and honey as the city prepares to host a variety of entertaining festivals and activities, including a food festival and a honey festival

eventCard.title: Days of Honey in Novi Sad
eventCard.content: The third annual honey festival, “Days of Honey”, will be held in Zmaj Jovina Street from December 10th to 13th. Beekeepers will showcase their offerings of bee products at stalls in the central street of Novi Sad.

eventCard.title: Flower Market
eventCard.content: The Novi Sad Goran Movement is organizing a new flower market on the plaza in front of SPENS on October 7th (Saturday). The Novi Sad flower market will be complemented with exhibitors of honey and health-safe food in addition to exhibitors of flowers, seedlings and horticulture equipment. Working hours from 8.30am to 6.00pm.

eventCard.title: Best Tamburitza
eventCard.content: Get ready for the ultimate tamburica competition, taking place at the wine cellar, “A sad adio”! Watch as talented musicians showcase their skills and compete for the title of best tamburica player. Join us for a night of unforgettable music and entertainment

heading.title: Explore Novi Sad
heading.subtitle: The European Capital of Culture for 2022
heading.content: To explore the many spaces of Novi Sad means to listen to its messages of multiculturalism, to feel the voices and faces of its many meanings, above all to discover a puzzle that is waiting to be understood anew. It is not a difficult task, you just need to stop and stay for a while in Novi Sad. You can't explore all Novi Sad's stories and places in one, two, three days...but you can get a sense of the unique content of Novi Sad's days, the warmth of its inhabitants, and you will remember everything together as an experience you want to experience again.

heading.title: City Centre
heading.content: The entire central area of Novi Sad, which consists of Trg slobode, Zmaj Jovina, Dunavska and the streets in their surroundings, is a kind of exhibition space, a collage of architectural styles and realized ideas of foreign and domestic architects-builders that attract the attention of visitors.

exploreCard.title: The city hall
exploreCard.content: The city hall, built in the Neo-Renaissance style in 1894 according to the project of Đerđe Molnar, with exterior decoration (allegorical figures) by Julije Anika, is one of the most beautiful buildings in the center of Novi Sad.

exploreCard.title: Monument of Svetozar Miletic
exploreCard.content: On Freedom Square there is a monument to the most important Serbian politician in Vojvodina in the 19th century, the work of sculptor Ivan Meštrović from 1939.

exploreCard.title: Roman Catholic church
exploreCard.content: Built in the neo-Gothic style according to the project of Đerđa Molnara between 1893 and 1895, with a tower 73 meters high, it is the highest place of worship in the city.

exploreCard.title: The Sinagogue
exploreCard.content: Together with the buildings of the former Jewish school and the Jewish community, the synagogue is a single unit built in 1909 in the Hungarian Art Nouveau style, according to the design of Lipot Baumhorn.

exploreCard.title: Matica Serbia
exploreCard.content: Matica srpska is the oldest and most respected cultural and scientific institution among the Serbs. It was founded in 1826 in Pest, and moved to Novi Sad in 1864.

exploreCard.title: Dunavska street
exploreCard.content: Is one of the oldest streets in the pedestrian zone, connecting the Danube bank and Zmaj Jovina Street. It starts with the oldest house in the city The House at the White Lion and the City Library. A large number of passages hide shops, souvenir shops, pastry shops and restaurants.

exploreCard.title: Zmaj Jovina street
exploreCard.content: The main street is in the pedestrian zone. It stretches from Freedom Square to Bishop's Palace. In this street there have always been shops and stores, and the oldest building is at number 28 - At the White Lion from 1720.

exploreCard.title: The Republic square and fish market
exploreCard.content: Republic Square is decorated with a monument to King Peter the First Karađorđević. The fish market is a place where you can buy products with geographical origin from Novi Sad and its surroundings, but also a place to meet and present traditions in the production of food, artisanal products, wine, honey, as well as a space where various manifestations take place in honor of food and wine.

exploreCard.title: Museums
exploreCard.content: Visit the Museum of Vojvodina with a tradition of over 150 years, the Museum of Accession in 1918, as well as the Museum of Contemporary Art.

exploreCard.title: Theaters
exploreCard.content: The Serbian National Theater was established in 1861, as the first professional theater in the Serbs, today it has three ensembles: Ballet, Opera and Drama.

heading.title: Green Novi Sad
heading.content: When your legs are tired and your senses are saturated from the colorful city center, take a break in one of the city's parks. They hide a wealth of protected species, while they themselves are natural monuments. Thanks to them, the city breathes, because they are its lungs.

exploreCard.title: Dunavski park
exploreCard.content: One part of it is based on Dunavska Street, after which it got its name. At the beginning of the 19th century, the place where the park is located today was a marshy land, which began to be drained and landscaped at the end of the 19th century.

exploreCard.title: Futoski park
exploreCard.content: Futoski Park was built in the first decade of the 20th century as a special purpose park around the Jodna Spa (Special Hospital for Rheumatic Diseases, Novi Sad). It covers an area of 8 ha, 13 ares, 6 m2 and is protected as a nature monument, i.e. a natural asset of the II and III categories.

exploreCard.title: Kamenicki park
exploreCard.content: In Sremska Kamenica, on the northern slopes of Fruska Gora, along the banks of the Danube, the largest and oldest park in Novi Sad is located - Kamenica Park, which covers an area of 33 ha and has been protected as a significant natural asset since 2008.

exploreCard.title: Limanski park
exploreCard.content: Liman Park is located in the central part of the Liman residential area in Novi Sad, in the immediate vicinity of the Danube River, and covers 12.9 ha. It is located on Liman III, between Oslobođenja Boulevard, Despot Stefana Boulevard, Šekspirova Street and Narodnog Street.

heading.title: Escape from the city
heading.content: If you are a lover of nature, good wines, and a more peaceful way of vacation, we invite you to go with us to Fruška Gora. Places that belong to most important material and cultural heritage in the territory of the National Park Fruška Gora include the complex of Serbian Orthodox monasteries. Fruška Gora is the area of good wines with the following prominent wine centres: Irig, Banoštor, Sremski Karlovci, and Šid.

exploreCard.title: Fruska gora
exploreCard.content: Fruska Gora National Park was founded in 1960 as the oldest park in socialist Yugoslavia. On an area of about 25,000 ha, unique landscapes, valuable geological and geomorphological units, rare plant and animal species and forest complexes are protected.

exploreCard.title: Vineyards
exploreCard.content: The history of Fruskogor's vineyards is an exciting story. Many people are familiar with the fact that the planned planting of scotch on Fruška Gora dates back to the reign of Emperor Probus (Marcus Aurelius Probus), who allowed vineyards to be planted in the Roman provinces as well.

exploreCard.title: Farms
exploreCard.content: In the vicinity of Novi Sad, there are numerous farms that offer a special type of vacation. In the realm of silence, a pleasant and relaxed atmosphere, visitors can enjoy horseback riding and carriage rides, a rich offer of Vojvodina specialties.

heading.title: Sightseeing tours
heading.content: The tourist organization of Novi Sad offers its visitors organized tours of the city's sights and familiarization with its rich history. It's just up to you to choose the way to get around.

exploreCard.title: Walking tours
exploreCard.content: To visitors of Novi Sad, who want to create their own way of visiting Novi Sad, the Tourism Organization of the City of Novi Sad suggests one of the routes offered in the Map of walking tours. You can choose the Blue and Red routes, which include the central zone on the Bač side of the City, or the Yellow route, which takes you to the Petrovaradin Fortress.

exploreCard.title: By bike through Novi Sad
exploreCard.content: Novi Sad currently has about 90 kilometers of trails and over 700 parking spaces for bicycles, and Serbian Athens is slowly becoming recognizable as Serbian Amsterdam. Bicycle paths lead past the most important city locations, the most important city roads and even further - recreationalists and tourists can visit several places near Novi Sad, but also try a slightly more extreme form of riding on Fruska Gora, where mountain biking has become increasingly popular in recent years.

exploreCard.title: Running tours
exploreCard.content: If you are passionate about running and plan to take your sneakers on the road, let us show you the best scenic routes in Novi Sad. It would be great to share with you the first-hand stories of the city.

heading.title: !In Vino Veritas!
heading.subtitle: Zadovoljite Vaša čula najkvalitetnijom hranom i pićem u gradu.
heading.content: Nakon duge šetnje, teškog posla, napornog dana, zaslužili ste predah, a kako sebe drugačije nagraditi nego uživanjem u najboljim zalogajima i gutljajima, zato, prepustite se hedonizmu i ne žalite. Život ulepšavaju sitnice. Novi Sad Vam nudi sve ono što Vam nedostaje! Dobro došli!

heading.title: RESTORANI
heading.content: Bez obzira da li volite da jedete u luksuznom restoranu ili u nekom opuštenom baru sa fantastičnom klopom, nikada nije štetno znati gde možete pojesti ukusan obrok. Da li je u pitanju poslovni ručak, romantična večera ili samo obilno meze uz omiljeno piće u Novom Sadu ćete uvek pronaći odgovarajuće mesto za to.

eatDrinkCard.title: Nacionalni
eatDrinkCard.content: Šta je ukusnije od domaće kuhinje? Uživajte u sarmi, karađorđevoj šnicli, ćevapima, pihtijama, čvarcima itd

eatDrinkCard.title: Ekspres
eatDrinkCard.content: Žurite, a gladni ste? Najbolja opcija za Vas jesu ekspres restorani koji nude kuvana jela vrhunskog kvaliteta.

eatDrinkCard.title: Veganski
eatDrinkCard.content: Niste fan mesa i ostalih proizvoda životinjskog porekla? Onda su veganski restorani pravi izbor za Vas.

eatDrinkCard.title: Veganski
eatDrinkCard.content: Niste fan mesa i ostalih proizvoda životinjskog porekla? Onda su veganski restorani pravi izbor za Vas.

heading.title: PICERIJE  /  PEKARE  /  PALAČINKARNICE  /  STREET FOOD
heading.content: Nemate dovoljno vremena za restorane? Nema problema, tu su pekare, street food, palačinkarnice, picerije itd. Nećete ostati gladni.

eatDrinkCard.title: Picerije
eatDrinkCard.content: Šta vam prvo padne na pamet kad ogladnite? Možda pica? Isprobajte naše specijalitete koje nikoga ne ostavljaju ravnodušnim.

eatDrinkCard.title: Pekare
eatDrinkCard.content: Ima li lepšeg mirisa od sveže spremljenog hleba? Dođite kod nas i probajte razne vrste peciva, slatkih proizvoda, bureka, sendviča.

eatDrinkCard.title: Palačinkarnice
eatDrinkCard.content: Mekana, topiva, satenski nežna, filovana po željama, postala sam simbol mnogih detinjstava. Dodaci su se stalno menjali, ali ja sam ostajala ista. Slane ili slatke?  Sve po Vašem ukusu!

eatDrinkCard.title: Street food
eatDrinkCard.content: Svetski trend popularnosti takozvane ulične hrane sve je izraženiji i u Novom Sadu. Lokali se gotovo preko noći otvaraju, ali i zatvaraju jer kod ove hrane opstaje samo ono što je kvalitetno. Ponuda je najraznovrsnija: od burgera, salata, palačinaka, girosa, pita, roštilja…

heading.title: POSLASTIČARNICE  /  KAFETERIJE
heading.content: Ako se zaželite onog ukusa torti i kolača uz kafu, koji vas podseća na neka lepša I veselija, bezbrižnija vremena, zaputite se kod nas. Čekamo Vas!

eatDrinkCard.title: Slatko da sve ide glatko
eatDrinkCard.content: Za one koji ne mogu zamisliti obrok bez dezerta, tu su poslastičarnice koje nude domaće štrudle, gomboce, vanil krancle, knedle, torte, krofne, sve što poželite. Posetite nas i uživajte u slatkim zalogajima.

eatDrinkCard.title: Kafica za balansiranje
eatDrinkCard.content: Kafom započinjemo dan, zato, napravite pauzu i opustite se uz miris i ukus moćnog napitka. Mesta sa odličnim izborom kafe u našem gradu je sve više, zato, ne čekajte i isprobajte različite vrste kafa.

heading.title: PIVNICE  / PABOVI
heading.subtitle: Kako bez piva?!
heading.content: Za početak, možete obići neku od novosadskih kafana ili neku od pivnica. Popularna mikropivara koja služi svoja kraft piva je “Brauhaus”, gde se održavaju i žurke. Neobičnu uslugu možete dobiti u “PUBeraju”, pabu koji je istovremeno i berbernica, pa uz pivo možete sačekati svoj red za šišanje.

eatDrinkCard.title: NOVOSADSKI DANI PIVA
eatDrinkCard.content: 4. i 5. novembar

eatDrinkCard.title: Muzika uživo
eatDrinkCard.content: I ovog petka izdvojili smo za vas najzanimljivije iz ponude noćnog provoda Novog Sada. Budući da vas u subotu očekuje jedan poseban spektakl, ponuda ostalih lokala u Novom Sadu za taj dan nije toliko raznovrsna kao za petak.

eatDrinkCard.title: Tehno uz pivo
eatDrinkCard.content: Vremenska prognoza najavljuje kišu i loše vreme, ali to ne utiče na žurke koju se najavljene. Pročitajte šta vas čeka predstojećeg vikenda u Novom Sadu, uz posebno iznenađenje za sve ljubitelje tehno zvuka.

heading.title: OSTALO...
heading.content: Salaši, čarde i vinski putevi na obodu gradskog područja pružaju mogućnost za gastronomski užitak,  često kombinovan sa tradicionalnim, veselim seoskim svetkovinama. U ambijentu karakterističnom za vojvođanska seoska domaćinstva u hladu voćnjaka, uz tradicionalnu hranu i dobra vina, možete bar za trenutak usporiti vreme i uživati.

eatDrinkCard.title: Čarde
eatDrinkCard.content: Ako hoćete da ovog vikenda pobegnete od gradske buke i vreve, da provedete dan na svežem vaduhu uz obalu reke, da pritom i dobro jedete, pravo mesto za vas su čarde. U krugu od 5 kilometara od centra Novog Sada su neki dobri riblji restorani.

eatDrinkCard.title: Vinarije/Vinoteke
eatDrinkCard.content: In vino veritas! Savremeni sortiment za proizvodnju crvenih fruškogorskih vina čine: merlo, probus, frankovka, portugizer, kaberne sovinjon, kaberne fran, pino crveni,a za bela vina:talijanski rizling, šardone, župljanka, sovinjon, traminac zatim neoplanta, sila, rajnski rizling..

eatDrinkCard.title: Salaši
eatDrinkCard.content: Ukoliko želite tišinu i odmor, salaši su izbor za vas. Moći ćete da napunite svoje baterije i da uživate u opuštenoj atmosferi i bogatoj ponudi raznih vojvođanskih specijaliteta.

heading.title: Osetite duh Zimske fantazije u Novom Sadu
heading.subtitle: “Ledena šuma” i bajkovito klizalište Dunavskog parka
heading.content: Šesta po redu manifestacija „Ledena šuma“ će se ove godine održati u periodu od 17. decembra, 2022. godine do 16. januara, 2023. godine, a na programu nas u duhu praznične tradicije i dobre zabave očekuje mnoštvo kulturnih dešavanja, edukativnih druženja, izložbenih aktivnosti i humanitarnih susreta. Uz raznovrstan program, jedinstveni ambijent Dunavskog parka upotpuniće i praznična dekoracija kao i Snežni grad-zimski bazar koji je namenjen prezentaciji lokalnih zanatlija i umetnika kao i promociji vojvođanskih gastronomskih specijaliteta i zimskih delikatesa

heading.title: Doček Nove godine u Petrovaradinskom podgrađu
heading.content: Novi Sad kao Evropska prestonica kulture zatvara titularnu 2022. godinu uz Doček, nesvakidašnji umetnički i produkcijski program koji će osvetliti barokni ambijent Podgrađa Petrovaradinske tvrđave. Publika će 31. decembra na nekoliko bina uživati u muzičkom programu: na glavnoj sceni ispred Beogradske kapije u 21 čas program otvara Perpetuum Jazzile, a nakon njih koncert će održati Kosheen od 23 časa i DJ Biesmans koji će nastupiti pola sata posle ponoći

eventCard.title: Perpetuum Jazzile
eventCard.content: “Kada glas postane instrument... i instrument postane glas, čuje se puls ritmičke svježine i harmonijske fuzije Perpetuum Jazzile.”

eventCard.title: Repetitor
eventCard.content: Jedna od najuzbudljivijih koncertnih atrakcija evropskog alternativnog roka, omiljeno ime mnogih festivala — Repetitor dolazi u Podgrađe! Svojom stvaralačkom veštinom još od prvog albuma osvajaju visoke ocene kritike, a njihovi živi nastupi publici donose jedinstvenu energiju, koju 31. decembra nećemo propustiti. Vidimo se na Dočeku u Štrosmajerovoj ulici, na maloj sceni u 23 časa.

heading.title: Božićno-novogodišnji koncerti
heading.content: Proslavite praznike nezaboravnim serijalom Božićnih i Novogodišnjih koncerata koji će uključivati neke od najtalentovanijih umetnika u regionu

eventCard.title: AMIRA MEDUNJANIN i VOJVOĐANSKI SIMFONIJSKI ORKESTAR
eventCard.subtitle: Srpsko narodno pozorište

heading.title: Muzeji i aktuelne izložbe
heading.content: Istražite svet umetnosti i kulture. Posetite naše muzeje i izložbe.

eventCard.title: Zimzarije u Muzeju Vojvodine
eventCard.content: Naša umetnička radionica će deci zimu učiniti kreativnom i pružiti im priliku da istraže svoje talente i stvore nezaboravna dela uz razne materijale i tehnike. Radionicu vode stručni umetnički pedagozi koji će podržavati i motivisati decu u njihovom umetničkom putu.

eventCard.title: Život posvećen lepoti i umetnosti
eventCard.content: U godini obeležavanja značajnog jubileja - 175 godina od osnivanja Galerije Matice srpske, realizujemo veliku monografsku izložbu posvećenu stvaralaštvu jednog od najistaknutijih nacionalnih slikara Uroša Predića. Kroz priču o liku i delu ovog velikana srpske kulture i umetnosti, istovremeno se ukazuje na temeljne vrednosti Galerije Matice srpske: zadužbinarstvo, posvećenost opštem dobru i nacionalnim

eventCard.title: Sava Šumanović i evropski realizmi između dva svetska rata
eventCard.content: Slikarski opus Save Šumanovića (1896 - 1942) gotovo u potpunosti pripada periodu između dva svetska rata. Njegove pojedine slike ili čitavi ciklusi pokazuju direktnu uključenost u bitne faze razvoja evropskog modernizma. Stvaranje celovite slike o Šumanovićevim realizmima i njihovim relacijama sa međunarodnim umetničkim tokovima bilo je polazište u realizaciji izložbe u Spomen-zbirci Pavla Beljanskog, Galeriji

heading.title: Poslednja trka u godini
heading.content: Spremite se za poslednju trku u godini! Winter Trail Race stiže na obronke Fruške Gore, pružajući izazovno i uzbudljivo iskustvo za sve učesnike. Ne propustite ovu priliku da prekoračite svoje granice i godinu završite u vrhunskom raspoloženju

heading.title: Sport i rekreacija
heading.content: Uživajte u raznim rekreativnim i sportskim aktivnostima u gradu! Od biciklizma, plivanja, joge, do raznih timskih sportova, postoje mnoge opcije za one koji žele da se zabave i održavaju formu. Pridružite se zabavi i provozajte sebe na nekoj od ovih aktivnosti!

eventCard.title: Ledena dvorana Spens
eventCard.content: Sezona klizanja u Novom Sadu uveliko je počela. Ledena dvorana Spensa će i ove zime biti mesto dobrog provoda i zabave, za najmlađe, zaljubljene, društvo, ali i za mame i tate i one malo starije...

eventCard.title: Trčanje i rekreacija
eventCard.content: Trim staza koja se nalazi na Beogradskom keju, napravljena je posle celokupne rekonstrukcije keja i važi za stazu koja je uredjena po najsavremenijim standardima. Dužina trim staze je u celoj dužini Beogradskog keja. Na ovoj stazi se...

eventCard.title: Biciklizam
eventCard.content: Pripremite se za biciklističku trku! Dođite i pokažite svoje veštine u ovom uzbudljivom događaju i takmičite se protiv drugih biciklista na zahtevnom terenu. Ne propustite priliku da se zabavite i pokažete svoj talent.

eventCard.title: Bazen SPC Slana Bara
eventCard.content: Spremi se da zaroniš! Zatvoreni bazen je ponovo otvoren! Nakon dve godine renoviranja i instalacije sistema za kvantnu filtraciju delimično hidrogenizovane vode, SPC Slana Bara kreće sa radom u nedelju, 18. decembra.

heading.title: Zabava
heading.content: Začinite svoj vikend nezaboravnim iskustvima

eventCard.title: Dani meda u Novom Sadu
eventCard.content: U Zmaj Jovinoj ulici od 10. do 13. decembra održava treći po redu festival pčelarskih prozvoda pod nazivom “Dani meda”. Na tezgama u centralnoj novosadskoj ulici svoje ponude izneće pčelari sa ponudom pčelinjih proizvoda, proizvođači pčelarske opreme, proizvođači kozmetike i preparata na bazi pčelinjih proizvoda, proizvođači vina, lekovitog bilja i čajeva, kao i proizvođači konditorskih proizvoda.

eventCard.title: Cvetna pijaca
eventCard.content: Pokret gorana Novog Sada, organizuje 7. oktobra (subota) na platou ispred SPENS-a novu cvetnu pijacu. Novosadska cvetna pijaca će pored izlagača sa cvećem, sadnicama i opremom za hortikulturu biti upotpunjena sa izlagačima meda i zdravstveno-bezbedne hrane. Radno vreme od 8.30 do 18.00 časova

eventCard.title: Najbolja tamburica
eventCard.content: Legendarni vinski podrum “A sad adio” i ove godine biće domaćin takmičenja za najbolju tamburicu Novog Sada. Vlasnik podruma, Dušan Belaja, u gradu poznat kao Beli, smatra da je ugođaj zagarantovan, a cena karte opravdana.

heading.title: Istražite Novi Sad
heading.subtitle: Evropsku prestonicu kulture za 2022. godinu
heading.content: Istražiti mnogobrojne prostore Novog Sada znači osluškivati njegove poruke multikulturalnosti, osećati glasove i lica njegovih mnogoznačnosti, nadasve otkriti slagalicu koja čeka da bude nanovo shvaćena. To nije težak zadatak, potrebno je samo zastati i ostati neko vreme u Novom Sadu. Ne možete istražiti sve novosadske priče i prostore za jedan, dva, tri dana...ali možete naslutiti neponovljivu sadržajnost novosadskih dana, srdačnost njegovih stanovnika, a sve zajedno ćete pamtiti kao iskustvo koje želite ponovo da doživite.

heading.title: Centar grada
heading.content: Čitava centralna zona Novog Sada, koju čine Trg slobode, Zmaj Jovina, Dunavska i ulice u njihovom okruženju,je svojevrsni izložbeni prostor, kolaž arhitektonskih stilova i realizovanih ideja inostranih i domaćih arhitekata-graditelja koja privlače pažnju posetilaca.

exploreCard.title: Gradska kuca
exploreCard.content: Gradska kuća izgrađena je u neorenesansno silu,1894. godine, predstavlja jednu od najlepših, građevina u Novom sadu. Ispred nje nalazi se spomenik,Svetozaru Miletiću, najznačajniji srpski političar iz 19. veka. Delo je vajara Ivana Meštrovića iz 1939. godine.

exploreCard.title: Spomenik Svetozaru Miletiću
exploreCard.content: Na Trgu slobode se nalazi spomenik najznačajnijem srpskom političaru u Vojvodini u 19. veku, rad vajara Ivana Meštrovića iz 1939. godine.

exploreCard.title: Rimokatolička crkva
exploreCard.content: Izgrađena u neogotskom stilu po projektu Đerđa Molnara između 1893. i 1895. godine, sa tornjem visokim 73 metra, predstavlja najvišu bogomolju u gradu.

exploreCard.title: Sinagoga
exploreCard.content: Sa zgradama nekadašnje Jevrejske škole i Jevrejske opštine, sinagoga predstavlja jednu celinu izgrađenu 1909. godine u stilu mađarske secesije, po projektu Lipota Baumhorna.

exploreCard.title: Matica srpska
exploreCard.content: Matica srpska je najstarija i najuglednija kulturna i naučna institucija kod Srba. Osnovana je 1826. godine u Pešti, a u Novi Sad preseljena 1864. godine.

exploreCard.title: Dunavska ulica
exploreCard.content: Jedna je od najstarijih ulica u pešačkoj zoni, a spaja obalu Dunava i Zmaj Jovinu ulicu. Započinje najstarijom kućom u gradu Kućom kod belog lava i Gradskom bibliotekom. Veliki broj pasaža krije prodavnice, suvenirnice, poslastičarnice i restorane.

exploreCard.title: Zmaj Jovina ulica
exploreCard.content: Glavna je ulica u pešačkoj zoni. Prostire se od Trga slobode do Vladičanskog dvora. U ovoj ulici oduvek su se nalazile trgovine i dućani, a najstarija zgrada je na broju 28 - Kod belog lava iz 1720. godine.

exploreCard.title: Trg Republike i riblja pijaca
exploreCard.content: Trg republike krasi spomenik kralju Petru Prvom Karađorđeviću. Riblja pijaca je mesto gde se mogu kupiti proizvodi sa geografskim poreklom iz Novog Sada i okoline, ali i mesto susretanja i prezentovanja tradicije u proizvodnji hrane, zanatskih proizvoda, vina, meda, kao i prostor na kome se dešavaju različite manifestacije u slavu hrane i vina.

exploreCard.title: Muzeji
exploreCard.content: Posetite muzej Vojvodine sa tradicijum dugom preko 150 godina, Muzej prisajedinjenja 1918., kao i muzej Savremene umetnosti.

exploreCard.title: Pozorišta
exploreCard.content: Srpsko narodno pozorište ustanovljeno je 1861. godine, kao prvo profesionalno pozorište u Srba, danas ima tri ansambla: Balet, Operu i Dramu.

heading.title: Zeleni Novi Sad
heading.content: Kada vam se noge zamore i čula zasite od živopisnog centra grada, napravite predah u jednom od gradskih parkova, koji kriju bogatstvo zaštićenih vrsta, dok su i sami spomenici prirode. Zahvaljujući njima grad diše, jer su oni njegova pluća.

exploreCard.title: Dunavski park
exploreCard.content: Jednim svojim delom se oslanja na Dunavsku ulicu po kojoj je i dobio ime. Početkom 19. veka na mestu gde se danas nalazi park bilo je močvarno zemljište koje je krajem 19. veka počelo da se isušuje i uređuje.

exploreCard.title: Futoški park
exploreCard.content: Futoški park je podignut  u prvoj dekadi 20. veka kao park specijalne namene oko Jodne banje (Specijalna bolnica za reumatske bolesti, Novi Sad). Prostire se na površini od 8 ha, 13 ari, 6 m2 i zaštićen je kao spomenik  prirode, odnosno prirodno dobro II i III kategorije.

exploreCard.title: Kamenički park
exploreCard.content: U Sremskoj Kamenici na severnim obroncima Fruške gore, duž obale Dunava, lociran je najveći i najstariji park u Novom Sadu – Kamenički park,koji se prostire  na 33 ha površine  i od 2008. godine je stavljen pod zaštitu kao značajno prirodno dobro.

exploreCard.title: Limanski park
exploreCard.content: Limanski park se nalazi u središnjem delu stambenog naselja Liman u Novom Sadu u neposrednoj blizini reke Dunav i prostire se na 12,9 ha. Nalazi se na Limanu III, između Bulevara Oslobođenja, Bulevara despota Stefana, Šekspirove ulice i Ulice Narodnog.

heading.title: Bekstvo iz grada
heading.content: Ukoliko ste ljubitelj prirode, dobrih vina, i mirnijeg načina odmora, prelažemo vam da krenete sa nama do Fruške gore. Među najznačajniju materijalnu kulturnu baštinu koja se nalazi na prostoru Nacionalnog parka Fruška gora možemo uvrstiti kompleks srpskih pravoslavnih manastira. Fruška gora je područje dobrih vina gde se izdvajaju sledeći vinski centri: Irig, Banoštor, Sremski Karlovci i Šid.

exploreCard.title: Fruška gora
exploreCard.content: Nacionalni park Fruška gora osnovan je 1960. kao najstariji u socijalističkoj Jugoslaviji. Na površini od oko 25.000 ha, koliko obuhvata NP Fruška gora, zaštićeni su jedinstveni pejzaži,vredne geološke i geomorfološke celine, retke biljne i životinjske vrste i šumski kompleksi.

exploreCard.title: Vinogradi
exploreCard.content: Istorija fruškogorskih vinograda je uzbudljiva priča. Mnogima je poznata spoznaja koja plansku sadnju čokota na Fruškoj gori smešta u vreme vladavine cara Proba (Marcus Aurelius Probus), koji je dozvolio da se i u rimskim provincijama podižu vinogradi

exploreCard.title: Salaši
exploreCard.content: U okolini Novog Sada su brojni salaši koji nude poseban vid odmora. U cаrstvu tišine, prijаtnoj i opuštenoj аtmosferi posetioci mogu uživati u jаhаnju i vožnji fijаkerom, bogаtoj ponudi vojvođаnskih specijаlitetа.

heading.title: Ture i obilasci
heading.content: Turistička organizacija Novog Sad nudi svojim posetiocima, organizovane ture obilazaka znamenitosti grada i upoznavanje sa bogatom istorijom. Na vama je samo da odaberete način obilaska.

exploreCard.title: Pešačke ture
exploreCard.content: Posetiocima Novog Sada, koji žele da sami kreiraju način na koji će obići Novi Sad, Turistička organizacija Grada Novog Sada predlaze jednu od ponuđenih ruta u Mapi pešačkih tura. Možete izabrati Plavu i Crvenu rutu koje obuhvataju centralnu zonu na bačkoj strani Grada ili Žutu rutu koja vas vodi na Petrovaradinsku tvrđavu. Ali, možete napraviti i neki drugi odabir koji je baš po vašem osećanju za lepo i interesantno. Istražite Novi Sad!

exploreCard.title: Biciklom kroz Novi Sad
exploreCard.content: Novi Sad trenutno ima oko 90 kilometara staza i preko 700 parking mesta za bicikle, a srpska Atina polako postaje prepoznatljiva i kao srpski Amsterdam. Biciklističke staze vode pored najznačajnijih gradskih lokacija, najvažnijih gradskih saobraćajnica i još dalje – rekreativci i turisti mogu da obiđu nekoliko mesta pored Novog Sada, ali i da se oprobaju u nešto ekstremnijem obliku vožnje na Fruškoj gori, gde se poslednjih godina razvio sve popularniji planinski biciklizam.

exploreCard.title: Trkačka tura
exploreCard.content: Ako ste strastveni za trčanjem i planirate da ponesete patike na put, dozvolite nam da vam pokažemo najbolje živopisne rute Novog Sada. Bilo bi sjajno podeliti sa vama gradske priče iz prve ruke.

heading.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Nobis impedit nisi possimus dolore accusamus adipisci. Porro rem saepe voluptatem deleniti provident ipsam debitis adipisci eaque voluptate, quas, sint, numquam fugit?

content.title: Neki naslov
content.subtitle: Neki podnaslov
